Description.Text: This hotel is perfect for guests seeking an authentic, unspoiled experience of Galicia - its beaches, its forests, its history and its cuisine.

All rooms come with a private bathroom and are equipped with satellite TV, a telephone and a safe. They feature a splendid balcony from where guests can enjoy views of the river, the beach and the sunsets. Furthermore, the hotel has a disability-friendly room and 2 suites offering a spa bathtub and a lounge.

This is a full hotel complex offering guests top service and facilities, all enhanced by surroundings rich in nature and history which will make guests' stays unforgettable. Guests staying at this establishment can enjoy all the conveniences of a large hotel, and will find all their requirements met. It comprises a total of 89 rooms.
